resources.string: This is a Quiz app made by Virabhadrasinh Barad Thank You
If a = b, b = d, c = d, d = 0, e = c, a is less than g, d less than h and f = a. Choose the correct expression among the followings
A 90kg particle A with a mass of 50cm.cu and a 80kg particle B with a mass of 60cm.cu; which particle is heavier? Please fill in either Particle A or Particle B:
Between a stone of 5kg and a very big sack of sand weighing 5kg, which is heavier ?
If you divide any number by zero i.e 5/0; what is the result ?
Entity A trades with $100,000 capital and makes a profit of $3000/yr; and Entity B with $60,000 capital and a profit of $2200/yr; which is performing better ?
Entity A trades with $100,000 capital and makes a loss of $3000/yr; and Entity B with $60,000 capital and a loss of $2200/yr; which is performing better ?
